Description

*** SHARED OWNERSHIP ***

Bairstow Eves presents this three bedroom mid-terraced house, located inside the gates, in Frinton-on-Sea. The property benefits from a large living room, a fully fitted kitchen, and downstairs WC, as well as two storage cupboards. To the first floor there are three bedrooms, a family bathroom and another storage cupboard. To the front of the property, there is ample parking, with two allocated spaces, and to the rear of the property, there is a good sized and well maintained garden with a shed, as well as a patio area.

This property is being sold through Shared Ownership, with the minimum initial purchase of 25%, a maximum of 75%, and can be staircased to a maximum of 80%.

The full market value of this property is £300,000

A 25% share value is £75,000
